title: Doorbell camera captures moment a CRANE collapses in California street
text:
A camera has captured the dramatic moment a crane collapsed in a suburban California street, leaving one person injured and three homes damaged.

The incident occurred in Long Beach on Monday afternoon while the crane was being used to replace a power pole in a backyard.

The collapse was caught on the doorbell camera of Jerry Gilmore, who lives directly across the street and who shared the shocking footage with KTLA.

It shows the crane fastened to the back of a truck, before the vehicle suddenly begins to tilt sideways under the weight of the falling piece of machinery.

The truck topples onto its side as the crane collapses in to a neighboring backyard, creating a loud bang.

An onlooker is seen walking nearby, and appears completely stunned at what he has just witnessed.

A camera has captured the dramatic moment a crane collapsed in a suburban California street, leaving one person injured and three homes damaged

Pastor Carl Kromminga was on the patio of his home when the collapse occurred, and was injured when he was hit by falling debris.

'I didn't know if it was one of the telephone poles or if the crane had come down or what. All I could see was that the roof over my patio had collapsed and missed crushing me,' he told ABC 7.

He soon realized he was bleeding and was rushed to the emergency room.

Pastor Kromminga received several stitches in his head and spent the night in hospital, but is expected to make a full recovery,

Aerial footage shows the crane completely toppled onto its side in the suburban street

Meanwhile, the news station says three homes were 'destroyed' in the incident, and they aired aerial footage showing the residences with damage to their roofs.

Gilmore - whose camera captured the collapse - told KTLA that power was shut out for several hours following the incident.

However, Southern California Edison said services were quickly to 6700 homes.

The company released a statement saying: 'Our thoughts are with the resident who was reported injured in the incident. SCE is currently reviewing and investigating the circumstances surrounding this incident'.
description: The incident occurred in Long Beach on Monday afternoon, while the crane was being used to replace a power pole in a backyard.
